recordTypes.name: Improvement Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to improve your property including: chicken coop, deck, driveway, fence, foundation, gazebo, hot tub, patio, pergola, pool, roof, shed, and siding.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a commercial permit including: new commercial structures, build-outs, change of occupancy, commercial roofing, commercial interior demolitions, and other miscellaneous commercial projects.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a residential permit including: a new single family residence, duplex, townhome, addition or detached garage structure.

recordTypes.name: Remodel Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to remodel your existing home including: addition, basement, fire restoration, flood restoration, residential interior demolition, and general residential remodeling.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an electrical permit including: electric service, generators, solar power, and other miscellaneous electrical work.

recordTypes.name: Water/Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a water or plumbing permit including: irrigation systems, sewer service, water meter and water service.

recordTypes.name: Miscellaneous Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a miscellaneous permit including: sales trailer, parking lot or miscellaneous/other.

recordTypes.name: Site Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a site permit to include mass grading and utilities.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit including: entire structure or an exterior feature.

recordTypes.name: Natural Planting Area Permit
recordTypes.description: Along with filling out the information in this submittal, a site plan detailing where the natural plantings are to be located on your property and a list of all plants to be planted must be attached to this record.  There is no fee for this permit.

categories.name: Permits
Code Enforcement
